column1: Specifications: "Powerful and compact multi-WAN UniFi Cloud Gateway with a full suite of advanced routing and security features."
Features: "Runs UniFi Network for full-stack network management
Manages 30+ UniFi Network devices and 300+ clients
"Networking interface": "LAN: (4) GbE RJ45 portsWAN: (1) 1/2.5 GbE RJ45 port"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-10 to 40° C (14 to 104° F)"
"Performance": "Redundant WAN with failover and load balancing\nWiFi QoS with UniFi APs\nApplication
column3:
and country-based QoS
Application and device type identification
Additional internet failover with LTE Backup
Internet quality and outage reporting"

column1: "Next-generation security": "Application-aware firewall rules\nSignature-based IPS/IDS threat detection\nContent
column4: and ad filtering\nVLAN/subnet-based traffic segmentation\nFull stateful firewall"

column2:
L2TP and OpenVPN server
OpenVPN client
OpenVPN and IPsec site-to-site VPN
One-click Teleport and Identity VPN
Policy-based WAN and VPN routing
DHCP relay
Customizable DHCP server
IGMP proxy
IPv6 ISP support"

column1: "Mobile app": "UniFi iOS™: Version 10.12.0 and later\nUniFi Android™: Version 10.11.2 and later"
